title: (HELP PLEASEEE) cant install-------------------
body:
Hello!

     I just replaced my hard drive on my computer and then re installed everything I used to have on my pc via system recovery flash drive sent to me by HP. It contained windows 10 and all the drivers and software my computer used to have. I am unable to download league of legends now but I could before my new hard drive. The error I'm getting is a visual c++ error code 1935. I have seen some threads about this and tried downloading the visual c++ 2005 right from Microsoft but I get the same error while I try to download that. Any help would be nice I will supply you with any information you need to know about my pc.

Thankyou

replies.body:
The 1935 C++ Error happens if you're missing certain dependencies that League needs to exist prior to installing League. I recommend first running Windows update to ensure your system is up to date. You'll then want to [uninstall any existing versions of C++ 2005](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/instantanswers/ce7ba88b-4e95-4354-b807-35732db36c4d/repair-or-remove-programs) you have on your PC before installing a fresh copy [from here](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387).

Let me know if this resolved your issue.

Hey I had a similar problem. When I went to install it said, "PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working" and then the program would Close. This is how I fixed the problem.. (not sure if it will help you but it can't hurt trying it)

1. move LoL to desktop and right click on it
2.  click "run as administrator"

If that doesn't work try...

1. move LoL to desktop and right click on it
2. go to properties
3. go to compatibility
4. go to "run this program in compatibility mode for" and select your windows
5. go to the bottom and click "run as administrator"
6. apply and okay

you could try all the window's options in #4 if the one you chose doesn't work

Good luck and again I hope it works but it can't hurt trying!
